 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbval2.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
cbval2.2 $e |- F/ w ph $.
cbval2.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbval2.4 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbval2.5 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvex2 $p |- ( E. x E. y ph <-> E. z E. w ps ) $.
$d w x $.
$d w z $.
$d x y $.
$d y z $.
